value:
Gathering supplies, preparing the
meals... Seems there's plenty to keep
me busy today.

My younger brothers are named Boyd
and Rolf. I care for them more than
anything.

Your face is looking a bit scrunched
today. This is just a suggestion, but...$k$pHow about you and I chat about your
problems, so you don't have to deal
with them on your own?

I used to be a Crimean knight, so I still
have a close friend within their ranks.

My contributions may be meager
compared to others, but I still want to
fight and save everyone I can.

Hi there—I'm Oscar. I've come with
greetings from
$Nf.

You need to keep your guard up,
even when you're at your best.

Not bad at all. Now I just need to
keep this up.

When you're not performing well,
make your priority just surviving.

Thanks for this. I'm glad to know
you expect good things from me.

I'm Oscar, from the Greil Mercenaries.
My skills lie mainly in... Hmm, let's
see... I guess, cooking for everyone?

Attend the war council, procure
supplies, coach a training session...
Let's see, what else is there to do...$k$pOh, hey, $Nu.
Sorry I'm so busy all the time. Such is
the life of a jack-of-all-trades.$k$pPeople come to me for help with all
sorts of things, and I'm more than
glad to help with all of them.$k$pIn fact, I'm happy people rely on me
for things like that.$k$pI'm the oldest of three brothers, so
helping out like this reminds me of
different times.$k$pSo if you need anything, just—$k$pHm? Oh, I know. I'll do my best
without pushing past my breaking
point. It's a promise.$k$pYour consideration for me is kind of
heartwarming, you know!
はぁっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
しまった…
My side will survive.
You must surrender!
I will give it my all.
I will not hold back.
Sorry...
Haha
Oh, hello. Feeling fine today, I hope?
Hmm? Oh, hello again. No need for that. I am always vigilant.
I am a great lover of food. How about you? What's your favorite dish?
You seem to get along with everyone. I wish I was more like that.
What is it that I want? To aid those who cannot aid themselves.
It pains me to lose a friend. Every time. But duty calls, and we are the ones to answer.
When we're in danger, you can—you must—rely on me.
Yes.
What next?
Only my best.
